```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(r2d3)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
data <- c(4, 8, 15, 16, 23, 42)
```

```{d3 echo=FALSE, data=data}

var totalWidth = document.getElementById("htmlwidget-1").offsetWidth

var totalWidth = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].clientWidth

var width = totalWidth*1;

svg.selectAll('rect')
  .data(data)
  .enter()
    .append('rect')
      .attr('width', function(d) { return d * 10; })
      .attr('height', '20px')
      .attr('y', function(d, i) { return i * 22; })
      .attr('fill', "blue");
      
var test = svg.append("g");

test.append('text')
  .text("This is a test")
  .attr("y", height)
  .attr("x", width)
  .attr("text-anchor", "end");
```
